entries.text: Thank you for calling VeloFit Customer Support. How may I help you today?
Yeah, hi. I need to return something. It's a VeloBand Pulse I bought like, two weeks ago. It's junk. Doesn't work right.
Okay, I understand. I'm happy to help you with a return. Can you please provide me with your order number or the email address associated with the purchase?
Ugh, one sec... it's [customer's email address]. And hurry up, I don't have all day.
Thank you. Let me pull up your order. Okay, I see your purchase of the VeloBand Pulse. Now, regarding our return policy, we generally offer a 90 days return window for most of our products.
Ninety days? Great! Because I've had this thing for 15 days, tops. I just want my money back. This VeloBand Pulse is completely useless. I expected more from a smart watch at this price.

I apologize for the inconvenience you've experienced with the VeloBand Pulse. According to our system, since you are within that 90 days timeframe, we can absolutely process a full refund for you. I'll initiate the return process now. You should receive a prepaid shipping label within 24 hours. Just pack up the VeloBand Pulse and ship it back to us.
Seriously? That's it? No hassle? No trying to convince me to keep it? Finally, some decent customer service. I was expecting a fight. I read your return policy was a pain, but apparently not.

No problem at all. We strive to make the return process as smooth as possible. We want you to be happy with your VeloFit experience, even when things don't go as planned. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?
No, that's it. Thank you so much! You've been a lifesaver. I really appreciate it.
You're very welcome! Have a great day, and thank you for choosing VeloFit!

Just to confirm, you'll receive the label in 24 hours and, again, the VeloBand Pulse needs to be returned to us. While the usual return policy is indeed 90 days, some items like this smart watch have slightly different terms. However, we've made an exception in this instance.
